name: Resident Evil Code: Veronica X
synopsis: Experience another terrifying chapter in the Resident Evil series with Resident Evil: Code Veronica X.  After narrowly surviving the horrific onslaught in Raccoon City, Claire Redfield now seeks clues in search of her missing brother, Chris.  Join Claire as she uncovers the insidious activities of the Umbrella Corporation.   Avoid or eliminate flesh-eating zombies and horrific beasts.  Use a variety weapons, items, and clues scattered around Raccoon City to help you survive the nightmare and make sure the virus doesn't spread any farther.
